DOC.brief_summary: This one-year clinical trial ass weight-loss , weight-maintenance , biochemical parameter follow weight-control diet use either standard food guide pyramid alone , standard food guide pyramid substitution mushroom meat .
DOC.brief_title: Substituting Mushrooms Meat Control Body Weight
DOC.detailed_description: This intervention study primary aim assess omnivorous adult male female ' ability control weight period 1 year . The control group require use 90 % lean ground beef time per week one year maintain personalize diet plan . The experimental group follow personalize diet well , require substitute mushroom meat least three time per week . Biochemical measure also assess response diet weight loss .
DOC.criteria: Male , female , > =18 year old Omnivorous BMI 2540 Seeking weightloss < 18 year old Vegetarians Dislike mushroom Chronic disease HIV+ Rheumatoid arthritis Pregnant nursing child Must selfreport allergy mushroom
